roleset.name: to gather or acquire
roleset.note: GARNER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'garner' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from garner.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The extra margin for bases in the U.S. enhances the power of the appropriations committees ; meanwhile , lawmakers-2 used their positions [*-2] to garner as much as six times what the Pentagon had requested [*T*-1]for their individual states .
example.arg: as much as six times what the Pentagon had requested [*T*-1] for their individual states
